definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: This plant subsists in water holes only during the rainy season.
sentences.chinese: 這種植物只有雨季在水坑裏出現。

sentences.english: Put on your boots. Splash ih the puddles.
sentences.chinese: 穿上你的靴子，飛濺在水坑裏。

sentences.english: Illogic song "Hate in a Puddle" good stuff.
sentences.chinese: 不合邏輯的歌曲恨一個水坑好東西。

sentences.english: At 11:30, he swung off his bunk and stepped into a puddle.
sentences.chinese: 11點半，賴特搖搖晃晃地下牀，一腳踩進了水坑裏。

sentences.english: The next station is Tai Shui Hang.
Thirsty zebras gather at water holes, circling them like necklaces of white-and-black beads.
sentences.chinese: 口渴的斑馬聚集在水坑處，如黑白相間的項珠環繞着。

sentences.english: The car's tires whispered through the puddles.
sentences.chinese: 穿過水坑時，汽車的輪胎髮出撲哧聲。

sentences.english: Frost hardenedthe water of the puddles into ice.
sentences.chinese: 嚴寒使水坑裏的水結成了冰。

sentences.english: Water spilled out making a puddle onto the table.
sentences.chinese: 溢出來的水在桌子上形成了一個水坑。

sentences.english: The dog licked up water in a puddle.
They found that the puddles contained two different subpopulations.
sentences.chinese: 他們發現這些水坑中有兩種不同的亞種。

sentences.english: Along the way take me around a puddle of mayotte, vehicles.
sentences.chinese: 一路上帶我繞開水坑，躲開車輛。

sentences.english: In the middle of the day he found two minnows in a large pool.
sentences.chinese: 中午時分，他在一個大水坑裏發現了兩條鰷魚。

sentences.english: Throughasmall forest, past a cemetery to see a puddle.
sentences.chinese: 穿過小樹林，走過一片墓地就看到了一個水坑。

sentences.english: Boys are running towards a waterhole in a hot &humid day
sentences.chinese: 在一個炎熱潮溼的日子，男孩子們奔向水坑。

definition: Shenkeng township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
